com.freedomotic.persistence

Interface Repository<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - class the repository is dedicated to
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CommandRepository, EnvironmentRepository, ReactionRepository, ThingRepository, TriggerRepository
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ReactionRepositoryImpl

    public interface Repository<T>
    Generic repository of freedomotics objects.
    Author:
    Matteo Mazzoni
